text: Park So-un (, also transliterated Park So-woon, born 31 March 1967) is a South Korean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Asian Games silver medalists for South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Park So-un
